elements.text: You are running errands and have spent much of the morning on your feet when suddenly, your heart starts racing and you feel lightheaded. You rush to your car, worried that you might be having a panic attack. After sitting down, you remember that these feelings could also be caused by low blood pressure related to your Parkinsonâ€™s; you turn on the air conditioning and drink some water, and soon your body starts to...
